text: ovun venuven ehi (ovungē dharmaya vana tavrātayehi) api mesē niyama kara tibuṇemu: “paṇaṭa paṇa, æsaṭa æsa, nahayaṭa nahaya, kaṇaṭa kaṇa, dataṭa data vaśayenda, tuvālavaṭada niyatavaśayenma paḷi ganu labanu æta” yanuveni. ehet kavurun hō paḷi gænīma (kṣamā kara), dānamānayak vaśayen athæra dæmuvahot eya ohuṭa (ohugē napuru kriyāvanṭa) vandi vaśayen vanu æta. kavurun allāh pahaḷa kaḷa (dharma niyamayanṭa) anuva viniścaya nokaḷōda, ovun niyata vaśayenma aparādhakaruvanya
